title: 一个玩家下线后服务器报错
author: Dawn_NULL
txt_content:
这个是报错部分,服务器报错后不会崩溃

[23:25:06 ERROR]: --- DO NOT REPORT THIS TO PAPER - THIS IS NOT A BUG OR A CRASH  - git-Paper-167 (MC: 1.14.4) ---
[23:25:06 ERROR]: The server has not responded for 19 seconds! Creating thread dump
[23:25:06 ERROR]: ------------------------------
[23:25:06 ERROR]: Server thread dump (Look for plugins here before reporting to Paper!):
[23:25:06 ERROR]: ------------------------------
[23:25:06 ERROR]: Current Thread: Server thread
[23:25:06 ERROR]:     PID: 24 | Suspended: false | Native: true | State: RUNNABLE
[23:25:06 ERROR]:     Stack:
[23:25:06 ERROR]:         java.io.RandomAccessFile.writeBytes(Native Method)
[23:25:06 ERROR]:         java.io.RandomAccessFile.write(RandomAccessFile.java:525)
[23:25:06 ERROR]:         net.minecraft.server.v1_14_R1.RegionFile.writeIntAndByte(RegionFile.java:371)
[23:25:06 ERROR]:         net.minecraft.server.v1_14_R1.RegionFile.a(RegionFile.java:310)
[23:25:06 ERROR]:         net.minecraft.server.v1_14_R1.RegionFile.writeChunk(RegionFile.java:375)
[23:25:06 ERROR]:         net.minecraft.server.v1_14_R1.RegionFile.a(RegionFile.java:281)
[23:25:06 ERROR]:         net.minecraft.server.v1_14_R1.RegionFile$ChunkBuffer.close(RegionFile.java:550)
[23:25:06 ERROR]:         java.io.FilterOutputStream.close(FilterOutputStream.java:159)
[23:25:06 ERROR]:         net.minecraft.server.v1_14_R1.RegionFileCache.writeRegion(RegionFileCache.java:118)
[23:25:06 ERROR]:         net.minecraft.server.v1_14_R1.RegionFileCache.write(RegionFileCache.java:289)
[23:25:06 ERROR]:         net.minecraft.server.v1_14_R1.IChunkLoader.write(IChunkLoader.java:90)
[23:25:06 ERROR]:         net.minecraft.server.v1_14_R1.PlayerChunkMap.saveChunk(PlayerChunkMap.java:784)
[23:25:06 ERROR]:         net.minecraft.server.v1_14_R1.PlayerChunkMap.saveIncrementally(PlayerChunkMap.java:316)
[23:25:06 ERROR]:         net.minecraft.server.v1_14_R1.ChunkProviderServer.saveIncrementally(ChunkProviderServer.java:357)
[23:25:06 ERROR]:         net.minecraft.server.v1_14_R1.WorldServer.saveIncrementally(WorldServer.java:775)
[23:25:06 ERROR]:         net.minecraft.server.v1_14_R1.MinecraftServer.a(MinecraftServer.java:1100)
[23:25:06 ERROR]:         net.minecraft.server.v1_14_R1.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:918)
[23:25:06 ERROR]:         java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:748)
[23:25:06 ERROR]: ------------------------------
[23:25:06 ERROR]: --- DO NOT REPORT THIS TO PAPER - THIS IS NOT A BUG OR A CRASH ---
[23:25:06 ERROR]: ------------------------------

replies.author: 漂浮
replies.txt_content: 是这个玩家下线一定会报错吗，这个虽然上面说不是一个错误，但还是有可能有造成的原因，整整19秒没结果

replies.author: @Override
replies.txt_content:
这不关玩家的事吧= =
服务器线程

replies.author: AOAEO
replies.txt_content: 最近我服务器也是显示这个，然后就崩了，回档，玩家没疯，我亏死了
